trans-unit.source: Provides enumeration support for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de enumeração para objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" />.

trans-unit.source: A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features.
trans-unit.target: Uma família de fontes é um conjunto de fontes que têm o mesmo tipo, como Arial, mas que diferem em recursos.

trans-unit.source: These feature differences include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, such as italic, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, such as bold.
trans-unit.target: Essas diferenças incluem <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, como itálico, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, como negrito.

trans-unit.source: ![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts")
trans-unit.target: ![Fontes](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "fontes")

trans-unit.source: Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members
trans-unit.target: Exemplo de tipos que são membros de família de fonte "Times New Roman"

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects from a specified font location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> de um local de fontes especificado.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O local que contém as fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> de um valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa o local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects that represent the fonts in <paramref name="location" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> que representa as fontes em <paramref name="location" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from a font location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objetos de um local de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="location" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="location" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <see langword="null" />, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Não é possível passar <see langword="null" />, pois esse parâmetro é tratado como um caminho ou [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] base do local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> de um valor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] que representa o local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects that represent the fonts in <paramref name="baseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> que representa as fontes em <paramref name="baseUri" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objetos de uma base de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] local.

trans-unit.source: To return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects in an application's resources, use the "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notation shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objetos em recursos do aplicativo, use "//aplicativo" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notação mostrada no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: For reading the contents of the specified <paramref name="baseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: Para ler o conteúdo do <paramref name="baseUri" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] base do local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O local que contém as fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> usando um valor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] base para resolver o local da fonte.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> que representa as fontes no local de fonte resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objects from the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objetos do local fonte resolvido.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the application contains a subdirectory named "resources".
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o aplicativo contém um subdiretório chamado "recursos".

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects from a specified directory location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> de um local de diretório especificado.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O local que contém as fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects from a string value that represents the font directory location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> de um valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa um local de diretório de fontes.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects that represent the fonts in <paramref name="location" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> que representa as fontes em <paramref name="location" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objects from a font location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objetos de um local de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="location" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="location" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass <see langword="null" />, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Não é possível passar <see langword="null" />, pois esse parâmetro é tratado como um caminho ou [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] base do local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the font location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> de um valor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] que representa o local da fonte.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects that represent the fonts in <paramref name="baseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> que representa as fontes em <paramref name="baseUri" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objects from a base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objetos de uma base de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] local.

trans-unit.source: To return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objects in an application's resources, use the "pack://application" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notation shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objetos em recursos do aplicativo, use "//aplicativo" [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] notação mostrada no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: For reading the contents of the specified <paramref name="baseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: Para ler o conteúdo do <paramref name="baseUri" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />.

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] base do local das fontes.

trans-unit.source: The location that contains the fonts.
trans-unit.target: O local que contém as fontes.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> usando um valor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] base para resolver o local da fonte.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> que representa as fontes no local de fonte resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to return the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objects from the resolved font location.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface> objetos do local fonte resolvido.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the application contains a subdirectory named "resources".
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o aplicativo contém um subdiretório chamado "recursos".

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> do local de fonte de sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> objetos que representam as fontes na coleção de fontes de sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects from the default system font location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> do local de fonte de sistema padrão.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Typeface" /> objetos que representam as fontes na coleção de fontes de sistema.
